akn:section.akn:heading: Extension of section 569 to tract of land in Idaho

akn:content.akn:p: § 569a. Extension of section 569 to tract of land in Idaho Section 569 of this title is extended to the following described land. All in lot 2, section 22, township 7 north, range 1 west, Boise meridian, beginning at the northwest corner of said lot 2, thence east along the northern boundary of said lot 2 nine hundred and ninety feet; thence south along a line parallel to the eastern boundary of said lot 2 to the intersection with the northerly meander line of the Payette River; thence westerly along the northerly meander line of the Payette River to the intersection with the western boundary of said lot 2; thence north along the western boundary of said lot 2 to the northwest corner of said lot 2, which is the point of beginning, comprising approximately twenty-five acres. (July 3, 1926, ch. 777, 44 Stat. 890.)
